name: Mobile application with a serverless backend
description: Use Cloud Functions along with Cognitive and Data services to build a serverless backend for a mobile application. The application shown in this tutorial is a feedback app that smartly analyses the tone of the feedback text and appropriately acknowledges the customer through a Push Notification.

name: Modern Web Application using MEAN stack on IBM Cloud

Author: IBM

name: Conversation Inspector for IBM Watson
description: The Conversation Inspector for IBM Watson is a tool for developers to build conversational user experiences with Watson Conversation. The purpose of the tool is to display and manipulate the JSON that is sent between applications and Watson Conversation services. This is useful when, for example, you use context variables extensively to manage state information.
